title: City Wolf
description: After almost a decade of self imposed solitude, Axton has a boyfriend. Leander might be a thousand miles away, but that still counts, right? Sure, maybe they haven't actually talked about their relationship status yet, and Axton might be a gay werewolf and Leander might be a human, but Ax is pretty sure things are going well. Leander wants Axton to come visit him, but who's going to take care of his forest while he's gone? Los Angeles is a big change for a reclusive werewolf, but he's in love and happy, with a new family--pack?--to look after. But when Axton's carefully buried past starts to catch up with him, it's only a matter of time before someone pays the price for his freedom.This is a book especially for fans of: shapeshifters, gay romance, action romance, lawyer romance, adventure romance, and gay for you.Word count: 98,599
author: S.P. Wayne
